features.body: Build complex layouts with ease using reusable, reorderable modules that can be shared globally or grouped into blueprints for rapid page creation.
features.title: Modular Architecture

features.body: Reach a global audience with native locale-aware content, translation family tracking, and dedicated translator roles built right into the core.
features.title: Multi-Language Support

features.body: Secure your workspace with granular, bouncer-powered permissions that ensure every team member—from translators to admins—has exactly the access they need.
features.title: Role-Based Access Control

features.body: Streamline collaboration with a multi-stage review system that allows editors to stage changes in drafts for human or AI-assisted approval before going live.
features.title: Content Workflows

features.body: Adapt the system to your unique business logic by easily extending module types, field definitions, and post types through a clean, developer-first API.
features.title: Fully Customizable

features.body:
Experience a modern, type-safe development environment built on 
AdonisJS 6, Inertia, and React, featuring a clean architecture designed for long-term maintainability.
features.title: Developer Friendly

features.body: Empower your team with specialized AI agents for SEO, design, and translation that can autonomously optimize content, generate meta-data, and create assets directly within the CMS using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
features.title: AI-Native Content Assistance

features.body: Dominate search rankings with automatic Schema Markup (JSON-LD) generation, optimized meta-tag management, and SEO-focused editing tools that can run automatically on every publish.
features.title: SEO-First Engineering

features.body: Deliver instant-loading experiences with full server-side rendering (SSR) and integrated Redis caching, ensuring your content stays fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable under heavy load.
features.title: High-Performance SSR Architecture

A unified stack for the next generation of web applications.

Adonis EOS isn't just a CMS; it’s a complete content infrastructure. Built on the robustness of AdonisJS 6 (MVC), it provides a flexible CMS engine with a drag-and-drop modular builder. Serve your content via a high-performance API, and leverage the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to expose your site's structure directly to AI models, making your content instantly "AI-ready."

props.title: A Node.js-first CMS starter for product teams
props.subtitle: EOS is an AdonisJS CMS starter that treats content modeling, modules, and performance as first-class concerns. It feels like a modern page builder, but lives entirely in your Node.js stack.

children.text: Empower your team with AI colleagues, not just AI tools.

Adonis EOS is built for the AI era. It treats AI agents as first-class citizens with their own roles, permissions, and specialized review workflows. Whether it's automated SEO optimization, multi-language translation, or dynamic image generation, your agents can perform any task a human editor can—all within a secure, staged environment that keeps you in control.

items.answer: Once you purchase a license you can use the product for as long as you like and receive all future updates at no additional cost.
items.question: What does “lifetime access” mean?

items.answer: Support is provided directly by the authors of the product so you get high‑quality, context‑aware answers.
items.question: How does support work?

items.answer: Yes. Your license covers an unlimited number of internal or client projects, as long as you are not reselling the kit itself as a competing product.
items.question: Can I use this for multiple projects?

items.answer: Free updates include new components, patterns, and improvements that we ship as part of the public roadmap for this product.
items.question: What do “free updates” include?

items.answer: In most cases you can use the kit in open‑source projects, as long as the project is not a direct replacement for this product (for example, a competing UI kit or page‑builder).

children.text: Heroes

items.answer: You will have access to download the full design source, including all of the pages, reusable components, responsive variants, and supporting illustrations.
items.question: What do you mean by “Figma assets”?

items.answer: Once you purchase a license you can use the product for as long as you like and receive all future updates at no additional cost.
items.question: What does “lifetime access” mean?

items.answer: Support is provided directly by the authors of the product so you get high‑quality, context‑aware answers.
items.question: How does support work?

items.answer: Yes. Your license covers an unlimited number of internal or client projects, as long as you are not reselling the kit itself as a competing product.
items.question: Can I use this for multiple projects?

items.answer: Free updates include new components, patterns, and improvements that we ship as part of the public roadmap for this product.
items.question: What do “free updates” include?

items.answer: In most cases you can use the kit in open‑source projects, as long as the project is not a direct replacement for this product (for example, a competing UI kit or page‑builder).
items.question: Can I use this in open‑source projects?

props.title: A Node.js-first CMS starter for product teams
props.subtitle: Adonis EOS is an AdonisJS + Inertia + React starter that treats content modeling, modules, and performance as first-class concerns. It feels like a modern page builder, but lives entirely in your Node.js stack.

props.title: Why Adonis EOS?

features.title: Modular Architecture
features.description: Build pages with reusable, composable modules. Create custom modules with our intuitive API and node ace commands.

features.title: Multi-Language Support
features.description: Built-in internationalization with locale-specific content, URL patterns, and translation workflows.

features.title: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Fine-grained permissions system with customizable roles for admins, editors, and translators.

features.title: Content Workflows
features.description: Review drafts, AI-assisted content, and approval workflows to ensure quality before publishing.

features.title: Fully Customizable
features.description: Tailwind CSS theming, custom post types, taxonomies, and extensible module system.

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Built on AdonisJS with TypeScript, Inertia.js, and React. Clean API, great DX, and comprehensive documentation.

props.subtitle: Built for modern Node.js development with everything you need out of the box

features.body: Build complex layouts with ease using reusable, reorderable modules that can be shared globally or grouped into blueprints for rapid page creation.
features.title: Modular Architecture

features.body: Reach a global audience with native locale-aware content, translation family tracking, and dedicated translator roles built right into the core.
features.title: Multi-Language Support

features.body: Secure your workspace with granular, bouncer-powered permissions that ensure every team member—from translators to admins—has exactly the access they need.

features.body: Streamline collaboration with a multi-stage review system that allows editors to stage changes in drafts for human or AI-assisted approval before going live.

features.body:

features.body: Empower your team with specialized AI agents for SEO, design, and translation that can autonomously optimize content, generate meta-data, and create assets directly within the CMS using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

features.body: Dominate search rankings with automatic Schema Markup (JSON-LD) generation, optimized meta-tag management, and SEO-focused editing tools that can run automatically on every publish.
features.title: SEO-First Engineering

features.body: Deliver instant-loading experiences with full server-side rendering (SSR) and integrated Redis caching, ensuring your content stays fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable under heavy load.

props.title: A Node.js-first CMS starter for product teams

children.text: A unified stack for the next generation of web applications.

Adonis EOS isn't just a CMS; it’s a complete content infrastructure. Built on the robustness of AdonisJS 6 (MVC), it provides a flexible CMS engine with a drag-and-drop modular builder. Serve your content via a high-performance API, and leverage the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to expose your site's structure directly to AI models, making your content instantly "AI-ready."

props.subtitle: EOS is an AdonisJS CMS starter that treats content modeling, modules, and performance as first-class concerns. It feels like a modern page builder, but lives entirely in your Node.js stack.

children.text: A unified stack for the next generation of web applications.

Adonis EOS isn't just a CMS; it’s a complete content infrastructure. Built on the robustness of AdonisJS 6 (MVC), it provides a flexible CMS engine with a drag-and-drop modular builder. Serve your content via a high-performance API, and leverage the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to expose your site's structure directly to AI models, making your content instantly "AI-ready."
T
his is a test

features.body: Build complex layouts with ease using reusable, reorderable modules that can be shared globally or grouped into blueprints for rapid page creation.
features.title: Modular Architecture

features.body: Reach a global audience with native locale-aware content, translation family tracking, and dedicated translator roles built right into the core.
features.title: Multi-Language Support

features.body: Secure your workspace with granular, bouncer-powered permissions that ensure every team member—from translators to admins—has exactly the access they need.
features.title: Role-Based Access Control

features.body: Streamline collaboration with a multi-stage review system that allows editors to stage changes in drafts for human or AI-assisted approval before going live.
features.title: Content Workflows

features.body: Adapt the system to your unique business logic by easily extending module types, field definitions, and post types through a clean, developer-first API.
features.title: Fully Customizable

features.body:
Experience a modern, type-safe development environment built on 
AdonisJS 6, Inertia, and React, featuring a clean architecture designed for long-term maintainability.
features.title: Developer Friendly

features.body: Empower your team with specialized AI agents for SEO, design, and translation that can autonomously optimize content, generate meta-data, and create assets directly within the CMS using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
features.title: AI-Native Content Assistance

features.body: Dominate search rankings with automatic Schema Markup (JSON-LD) generation, optimized meta-tag management, and SEO-focused editing tools that can run automatically on every publish.
features.title: SEO-First Engineering

features.body: Deliver instant-loading experiences with full server-side rendering (SSR) and integrated Redis caching, ensuring your content stays fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable under heavy load.
features.title: High-Performance SSR Architecture

items.answer: You will have access to download the full design source, including all of the pages, reusable components, responsive variants, and supporting illustrations.
items.question: What do you mean by “Figma assets”?

items.answer: Once you purchase a license you can use the product for as long as you like and receive all future updates at no additional cost.
items.question: What does “lifetime access” mean?

items.answer: Support is provided directly by the authors of the product so you get high‑quality, context‑aware answers.
items.question: How does support work?

items.answer: Yes. Your license covers an unlimited number of internal or client projects, as long as you are not reselling the kit itself as a competing product.
items.question: Can I use this for multiple projects?

items.answer: Free updates include new components, patterns, and improvements that we ship as part of the public roadmap for this product.
items.question: What do “free updates” include?

items.answer: In most cases you can use the kit in open‑source projects, as long as the project is not a direct replacement for this product (for example, a competing UI kit or page‑builder).
items.question: Can I use this in open‑source projects?

items.answer: You will have access to download the full design source, including all of the pages, reusable components, responsive variants, and supporting illustrations.
items.question: What do you mean by “Figma assets”?

items.answer: Once you purchase a license you can use the product for as long as you like and receive all future updates at no additional cost.
items.question: What does “lifetime access” mean?

items.answer: Support is provided directly by the authors of the product so you get high‑quality, context‑aware answers.
items.question: How does support work?

items.answer: Yes. Your license covers an unlimited number of internal or client projects, as long as you are not reselling the kit itself as a competing product.
items.question: Can I use this for multiple projects?

items.answer: Free updates include new components, patterns, and improvements that we ship as part of the public roadmap for this product.
items.question: What do “free updates” include?

items.answer: In most cases you can use the kit in open‑source projects, as long as the project is not a direct replacement for this product (for example, a competing UI kit or page‑builder).
items.question: Can I use this in open‑source projects?

post.metaDescription: Adonis EOS is a Node.js-first CMS starter built on AdonisJS, Inertia, and React. Model content with modules, keep everything in your TypeScript codebase, and ship fast with a modern editorial experience.

props.title: A Node.js-first CMS starter for product teams
props.subtitle: EOS is an AdonisJS CMS starter that treats content modeling, modules, and performance as first-class concerns. It feels like a modern page builder, but lives entirely in your Node.js stack.

children.text: Testing

features.body: Build complex layouts with ease using reusable, reorderable modules that can be shared globally or grouped into blueprints for rapid page creation.
features.title: Modular Architecture

features.body: Reach a global audience with native locale-aware content, translation family tracking, and dedicated translator roles built right into the core.
features.title: Multi-Language Support

features.body: Secure your workspace with granular, bouncer-powered permissions that ensure every team member—from translators to admins—has exactly the access they need.
features.title: Role-Based Access Control

features.body: Streamline collaboration with a multi-stage review system that allows editors to stage changes in drafts for human or AI-assisted approval before going live.
features.title: Content Workflows

features.body: Adapt the system to your unique business logic by easily extending module types, field definitions, and post types through a clean, developer-first API.
features.title: Fully Customizable

features.body:
Experience a modern, type-safe development environment built on 
AdonisJS 6, Inertia, and React, featuring a clean architecture designed for long-term maintainability.
features.title: Developer Friendly

features.body: Empower your team with specialized AI agents for SEO, design, and translation that can autonomously optimize content, generate meta-data, and create assets directly within the CMS using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
features.title: AI-Native Content Assistance

features.body: Dominate search rankings with automatic Schema Markup (JSON-LD) generation, optimized meta-tag management, and SEO-focused editing tools that can run automatically on every publish.
features.title: SEO-First Engineering

features.body: Deliver instant-loading experiences with full server-side rendering (SSR) and integrated Redis caching, ensuring your content stays fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable under heavy load.
features.title: High-Performance SSR Architecture

props.title: A Node.js-first CMS starter for product teams
props.subtitle: EOS is an AdonisJS CMS starter that treats content modeling, modules, and performance as first-class concerns. It feels like a modern page builder, but lives entirely in your Node.js stack.

children.text: A unified stack for the next generation of web applications.

Adonis EOS isn't just a CMS; it’s a complete content infrastructure. Built on the robustness of AdonisJS 6 (MVC), it provides a flexible CMS engine with a drag-and-drop modular builder. Serve your content via a high-performance API, and leverage the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to expose your site's structure directly to AI models, making your content instantly "AI-ready."

children.text: Empower your team with AI colleagues, not just AI tools.

Adonis EOS is built for the AI era. It treats AI agents as first-class citizens with their own roles, permissions, and specialized review workflows. Whether it's automated SEO optimization, multi-language translation, or dynamic image generation, your agents can perform any task a human editor can—all within a secure, staged environment that keeps you in control.
Start building with Adonis EOS today.
Get a head start with our high-performance, SEO-first starter kit. Scale from a simple landing page to a complex multi-language site with ease.
